meanings.sent1: The holders of the keys were responsible for opening the doors.
meanings.sent2: The holders of the tickets waited patiently in line for the concert.
meanings.sent3: The holders of the secret recipe guarded it with great care.
meanings.sent4: She was the holder of the family traditions, passing them down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The holders of the championship trophy celebrated their victory with joy.

meanings.definition: An object used to hold something in place.
meanings.sent1: The cup holders in the car kept the drinks from spilling.
meanings.sent2: The book holders on the shelf kept the books neatly organized.
meanings.sent3: The phone holders on the desk prevented the devices from getting lost.
meanings.sent4: The candle holders on the table added a warm glow to the room.
meanings.sent5: The umbrella holders by the door kept the entrance tidy and dry.

meanings.sent1: The document holders on the desk kept the papers organized.
meanings.sent2: The tool holders in the garage stored the equipment efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The phone holders on the wall made it easy to charge devices.
meanings.sent4: The cup holders in the car were convenient for holding beverages.
meanings.sent5: The pen holders on the desk kept writing utensils within reach.
